attributes.action: Ban motor racing of any sort within the boundaries of the UK.
attributes.additional_details: It is a gross immorality to take extra GREEN taxes off pensioners and others on low wages who simply cannot afford it, for Lewis Hamilton and many others then to be paid MILLIONS every year for racing motor cars which then INCREASE THE CARBON FOOTPRINT OF THE UK.  This immorality cannot be allowed to obtain.  Either we scrap green taxes or we stop activities which make those green taxes necessary.  Even a government as corrupt as our current one can produce any sort of cogent argument against that paradox.
